Program Information.Program Name: Academic Upgrading Program for Deaf and Hard of Hearing Adults
Program Information.Duration: 1 to 5 semesters depending on studentâ€™s goal
Program Information.Domestic Tuition: There are no fees. This program is funded by Employment Ontario through the Ministry of Labour, Training and Skills Development (MLTSD)

Contact Related Information: The Academic Upgrading Program for Deaf and hard-of-hearing adults is situated on the 6th floor of the "H" building at George Brown College's St. James Campus, specifically located at 341 King Street East in Toronto, Ontario. For applications and intake inquiries, contact deafupgrading@georgebrown.ca.
